attributes.action: cancel the mistakes made by tax credits department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax credits replaced the old tax code system. We were told to fill it out 1000s of us did. only to find out the tax credit department never knew their job. we are now told we have to pay back any money we had. money we don,t have. It was not our mistake we filled in the forms truthfully it is the poor again that get targeted we end up in court it was not our fault

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "cancel the mistakes made by tax credits department."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14668.asp

Prime Minister's Office
